name: Panda Baby Pop: Endless Runner
description:
A brand new Panda running game which you will love! And it is 100% FREE!

Panda Baby Pop: Endless Runner is endless running game where you need to get as far as possible. It is a fun and lovely game which will make your day so much better!

Get extra point by collecting coins. Jump from one platform to another with just an easy touch! Double tap for double jump.

Be careful - as further you get - as faster the baby panda will run!

Get as many points possible and be on the top of the leaderboard!

Challenge your friends to play and have double fun!

Panda Baby Pop: Endless Runner is waiting just for you!

Become the master of this game. If you love animals, nature and pandas, you will love this game!

Leave a rating if you love this game!
